00081         public function __construct($key = null, $secret_key = null)

00089         // AUTHENTICATION
00090 
00104         public function authenticate($bucket, $opt = null, $location = null, $redirects = 0)
00105         {
00106                 // If nothing was passed in, don't do anything.
00107                 if (!$opt)
00108                 {
00109                         return false;
00110                 }
00111                 else
00112                 {
00113                         // Set default values
00114                         $bucket = strtolower($bucket);
00115                         $acl = null;
00116                         $body = null;
00117                         $contentType = null;
00118                         $delimiter = null;
00119                         $filename = null;
00120                         $marker = null;
00121                         $maxKeys = null;
00122                         $method = null;
00123                         $prefix = null;
00124                         $verb = null;
00125                         $returnCurlHandle = null;
00126 
00127                         // Break the array into individual variables, while storing the original.
00128                         $_opt = $opt;
00129                         extract($opt);
00130 
00131                         // Set hostname
00132                         if ($method == 'list_buckets')
00133                         {
00134                                 $hostname = 's3.amazonaws.com';
00135                         }
00136                         else
00137                         {
00138                                 $hostname = $bucket . '.s3.amazonaws.com';
00139                         }
00140 
00141                         // Get the UTC timestamp in RFC 2616 format
00142                         $httpDate = gmdate(DATE_AWS_RFC2616, time());
00143 
00144                         // Generate the request string
00145                         $request = '';
00146 
00147                         // Append additional parameters
00148                         $request .= '/' . $filename;
00149 
00150                         // List Object settings
00151                         if ($method == 'list_objects')
00152                         {
00153                                 if (isset($prefix) && !empty($prefix))
00154                                 {
00155                                         $request = '/?prefix=' . $prefix;
00156                                 }
00157                                 else if (isset($marker) && !empty($marker))
00158                                 {
00159                                         $request = '/?marker=' . $marker;
00160                                 }
00161                                 else if (isset($maxKeys) && !empty($maxKeys))
00162                                 {
00163                                         $request = '/?max-keys=' . $maxKeys;
00164                                 }
00165                                 else if (isset($delimiter) && !empty($delimiter))
00166                                 {
00167                                         $request = '/?delimiter=' . $delimiter;
00168                                 }
00169                         }
00170 
00171                         // Get Bucket Locale settings
00172                         if ($method == 'get_bucket_locale')
00173                         {
00174                                 $request = '/?location';
00175                                 $filename = '?location';
00176                         }
00177 
00178                         if (!$request == '/')
00179                         {
00180                                 $request = '/' . $request;
00181                         }
00182 
00183                         // Prepare the request.
00184                         if ($location)
00185                         {
00186                                 $this->request_url = $location;
00187                         }
00188                         else
00189                         {
00190                                 $this->request_url = 'http://' . $hostname . $request;
00191                         }
00192 
00193                         // Add ACL stuff if we're getting/setting ACL preferences.
00194                         if ($method == 'get_bucket_acl' || $method == 'set_bucket_acl' || $method == 'get_object_acl' || $method == 'set_object_acl')
00195                         {
00196                                 $this->request_url .= '?acl';
00197                                 $filename .= '?acl';
00198                         }
00199 
00200                         $req = new $this->request_class($this->request_url);
00201 
00202                         // Do we have a verb?
00203                         if (isset($verb) && !empty($verb))
00204                         {
00205                                 $req->setMethod($verb);
00206                         }
00207 
00208                         // Do we have a contentType?
00209                         if (isset($contentType) && !empty($contentType))
00210                         {
00211                                 $req->addHeader("Content-Type", $contentType);
00212                         }
00213                         else if ($verb == HTTP_PUT) // Set a default value for HTTP_PUT
00214                         {
00215                                 $contentType = 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded';
00216                         }
00217 
00218                         // Do we have a date?
00219                         if (isset($httpDate) && !empty($httpDate))
00220                         {
00221                                 $req->addHeader("Date", $httpDate);
00222                         }
00223 
00224                         // Do we have ACL settings? (Optional in signed string)
00225                         if (isset($acl) && !empty($acl))
00226                         {
00227                                 $req->addHeader("x-amz-acl", $acl);
00228                                 $acl = 'x-amz-acl:' . $acl . "\n";
00229                         }
00230 
00231                         // Do we have COPY settings?
00232                         if ($method == 'copy_object')
00233                         {
00234                                 $acl .= 'x-amz-copy-source:/' . $sourceBucket . '/' . $sourceObject . "\n";
00235                                 $req->addHeader('x-amz-copy-source', '/' . $sourceBucket . '/' . $sourceObject);
00236                         }
00237 
00238                         // Add a body if we're creating
00239                         if ($method == 'create_object' || $method == 'create_bucket')
00240                         {
00241                                 if (isset($body) && !empty($body))
00242                                 {
00243                                         $req->setBody($body);
00244                                 }
00245                         }
00246 
00247                         // Data that will be "signed".
00248                         $filename = '/' . $filename;
00249 
00250                         // If we're listing buckets, there is no filename value.
00251                         if ($method == 'list_buckets')
00252                         {
00253                                 $filename = '';
00254                         }
00255 
00256                         // Prepare the string to sign
00257                         $stringToSign = "$verb\n\n$contentType\n$httpDate\n$acl/$bucket$filename";
00258 
00259                         // Hash the AWS secret key and generate a signature for the request.
00260                         $signature = $this->util->hex_to_base64(hash_hmac('sha1', $stringToSign, $this->secret_key));
00261 
00262                         // Pass the developer key and signature
00263                         $req->addHeader("Authorization", "AWS " . $this->key . ":" . $signature);
00264 
00265                         // If we have a "true" value for returnCurlHandle, do that instead of completing the request.
00266                         if ($returnCurlHandle)
00267                         {
00268                                 return $req->prepRequest();
00269                         }
00270 
00271                         // Send!
00272                         $req->sendRequest();
00273 
00274                         // Prepare the response.
00275                         $headers = $req->getResponseHeader();
00276                         $headers['x-tarzan-redirects'] = $redirects;
00277                         $headers['x-tarzan-requesturl'] = $this->request_url;
00278                         $headers['x-tarzan-stringtosign'] = $stringToSign;
00279                         $data = new $this->response_class($headers, $req->getResponseBody(), $req->getResponseCode());
00280 
00281                         // Did Amazon tell us to redirect? Typically happens for multiple rapid requests EU datacenters.
00282                         // @see http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AmazonS3/2006-03-01/Redirects.html
00283                         if ((int) $req->getResponseCode() == 307) // Temporary redirect to new endpoint.
00284                         {
00285                                 $redirects++;
00286                                 $data = $this->authenticate($bucket, 
00287                                         $_opt, 
00288                                         $headers['location'], 
00289                                         $redirects);
00290                         }
00291 
00292                         // Return!
00293                         return $data;
00294                 }
00295         }

00315         public function create_bucket($bucket, $locale = null, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00316         {
00317                 // Defaults
00318                 $body = null;
00319                 $contentType = null;
00320 
00321                 if ($locale)
00322                 {
00323                         switch(strtolower($locale))
00324                         {
00325                                 case 'eu':
00326                                         $body = '<CreateBucketConfiguration><LocationConstraint>' . strtoupper($locale) . '</LocationConstraint></CreateBucketConfiguration>';
00327                                         $contentType = 'application/xml';
00328                                         break;
00329                         }
00330                 }
00331 
00332                 // Authenticate to S3
00333                 return $this->authenticate($bucket, array(
00334                         'verb' => HTTP_PUT,
00335                         'method' => 'create_bucket',
00336                         'body' => $body,
00337                         'contentType' => $contentType,
00338                         'returnCurlHandle' => $returnCurlHandle
00339                 ));
00340         }

00429         public function delete_bucket($bucket, $force = false, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00430         {
00431                 // Set default value
00432                 $success = true;
00433 
00434                 if ($force)
00435                 {
00436                         // Delete all of the items from the bucket.
00437                         $success = $this->delete_all_objects($bucket);
00438                 }
00439 
00440                 // As long as we were successful...
00441                 if ($success)
00442                 {
00443                         // Add this to our request
00444                         $opt = array();
00445                         $opt['verb'] = HTTP_DELETE;
00446                         $opt['method'] = 'delete_bucket';
00447                         $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00448 
00449                         // Authenticate to S3
00450                         return $this->authenticate($bucket, $opt);
00451                 }
00452 
00453                 return false;
00454         }

00468         public function copy_bucket($source_bucket, $dest_bucket)
00469         {
00470                 $dest = $this->create_bucket($dest_bucket);
00471 
00472                 if ($dest->isOK())
00473                 {
00474                         $list = $this->get_object_list($source_bucket);
00475                         $handles = array();
00476         
00477                         foreach ($list as $item)
00478                         {
00479                                 $handles[] = $this->copy_object($source_bucket, $item, $dest_bucket, $item, S3_ACL_PRIVATE, true);
00480                         }
00481 
00482                         $request = new $this->request_class(null);
00483                         return $request->sendMultiRequest($handles);
00484                 }
00485         }

00497         public function rename_bucket($source_bucket, $dest_bucket)
00498         {
00499                 $responses = array();
00500                 $responses['copy'] = $this->copy_bucket($source_bucket, $dest_bucket);
00501                 $responses['delete'] = $this->delete_bucket($source_bucket, true);
00502 
00503                 return $responses;
00504         }

00530         public function get_bucket_filesize($bucket, $friendly_format = false)
00531         {
00532                 $filesize = 0;
00533                 $list = $this->list_objects($bucket);
00534 
00535                 foreach ($list->body->Contents as $filename)
00536                 {
00537                         $filesize += (int) $filename->Size;
00538                 }
00539 
00540                 if ($friendly_format)
00541                 {
00542                         $filesize = $this->util->size_readable($filesize);
00543                 }
00544 
00545                 return $filesize;
00546         }

00577         public function get_bucket_list($pcre = null)
00578         {
00579                 // Set some default values
00580                 $bucketnames = array();
00581 
00582                 // Get a list of buckets.
00583                 $list = $this->list_buckets();
00584 
00585                 // If we have a PCRE regex, store it.
00586                 if ($pcre)
00587                 {
00588                         // Loop through and find the bucket names.
00589                         foreach ($list->body->Buckets->Bucket as $bucket)
00590                         {
00591                                 $bucket = (string) $bucket->Name;
00592 
00593                                 if (preg_match($pcre, $bucket))
00594                                 {
00595                                         $bucketnames[] = $bucket;
00596                                 }
00597                         }
00598                 }
00599                 else
00600                 {
00601                         // Loop through and find the bucket names.
00602                         foreach ($list->body->Buckets->Bucket as $bucket)
00603                         {
00604                                 $bucketnames[] = (string) $bucket->Name;
00605                         }
00606                 }
00607 
00608                 return (count($bucketnames) > 0) ? $bucketnames : null;
00609         }

00796         public function delete_all_objects($bucket, $pcre = S3_PCRE_ALL)
00797         {
00798                 // Collect all matches
00799                 $list = $this->get_object_list($bucket, array('pcre', $pcre));
00800 
00801                 // As long as we have at least one match...
00802                 if (count($list) > 0)
00803                 {
00804                         // Hold CURL handles
00805                         $handles = array();
00806 
00807                         // Go through all of the items and delete them.
00808                         foreach ($list as $item)
00809                         {
00810                                 $handles[] = $this->delete_object($bucket, $item, true);
00811                         }
00812 
00813                         $request = new $this->request_class(null);
00814                         return $request->sendMultiRequest($handles);
00815                 }
00816 
00817                 return false;
00818         }

00860         public function get_object_filesize($bucket, $filename, $friendly_format = false)
00861         {
00862                 $object = $this->head_object($bucket, $filename);
00863                 $filesize = (integer) $object->header['content-length'];
00864 
00865                 if ($friendly_format)
00866                 {
00867                         $filesize = $this->util->size_readable($filesize);
00868                 }
00869 
00870                 return $filesize;
00871         }

00891         public function get_object_list($bucket, $opt = null)
00892         {
00893                 // Set some default values
00894                 $filenames = array();
00895                 $pcre = null;
00896 
00897                 // Get a list of files.
00898                 $list = $this->list_objects($bucket, $opt);
00899 
00900                 // Extract the options
00901                 if ($opt)
00902                 {
00903                         extract($opt);
00904                 }
00905 
00906                 // If we have a PCRE regex, store it.
00907                 if ($pcre)
00908                 {
00909                         // Loop through and find the filenames.
00910                         foreach ($list->body->Contents as $file)
00911                         {
00912                                 $file = (string) $file->Key;
00913 
00914                                 if (preg_match($pcre, $file))
00915                                 {
00916                                         $filenames[] = $file;
00917                                 }
00918                         }
00919                 }
00920                 else
00921                 {
00922                         // Loop through and find the filenames.
00923                         foreach ($list->body->Contents as $file)
00924                         {
00925                                 $filenames[] = (string) $file->Key;
00926                         }
00927                 }
00928 
00929                 return (count($filenames) > 0) ? $filenames : null;
00930         }
00931 
00949         public function copy_object($source_bucket, $source_filename, $dest_bucket, $dest_filename, $acl = S3_ACL_PRIVATE, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00950         {
00951                 // Add this to our request
00952                 $opt['verb'] = HTTP_PUT;
00953                 $opt['method'] = 'copy_object';
00954                 $opt['sourceBucket'] = $source_bucket;
00955                 $opt['sourceObject'] = $source_filename;
00956                 $opt['destinationBucket'] = $dest_bucket;
00957                 $opt['destinationObject'] = $dest_filename;
00958                 $opt['metadataDirective'] = 'COPY';
00959                 $opt['acl'] = $acl;
00960                 $opt['filename'] = rawurlencode($dest_filename);
00961                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00962 
00963                 // Authenticate to S3
00964                 return $this->authenticate($dest_bucket, $opt);
00965         }
00966 
00979         public function duplicate_object($bucket, $source_filename, $dest_filename, $acl = S3_ACL_PRIVATE)
00980         {
00981                 return $this->copy_object($bucket, $source_filename, $bucket, $dest_filename, $acl);
00982         }

00997         public function move_object($source_bucket, $source_filename, $dest_bucket, $dest_filename, $acl = S3_ACL_PRIVATE)
00998         {
00999                 $copy = $this->copy_object($source_bucket, $source_filename, $dest_bucket, $dest_filename, $acl);
01000                 $del = $this->delete_object($source_bucket, $source_filename);
01001                 return $copy;
01002         }

01071         /*%******************************************************************************************%*/
01072         // MISCELLANEOUS METHODS
01073 
01091         public function store_remote_file($remote_file, $bucket, $filename, $opt = null)
01092         {
01093                 // Set default values.
01094                 $acl = S3_ACL_PUBLIC;
01095                 $overwrite = false;
01096                 $cname = null;
01097 
01098                 if ($opt)
01099                 {
01100                         // Break the options out.
01101                         extract($opt);
01102                 }
01103 
01104                 // Does the file already exist?
01105                 $object = $this->head_object($bucket, $filename);
01106 
01107                 // As long as it doesn't already exist, fetch and store it.
01108                 if (!$object->isOK() || $overwrite)
01109                 {
01110                         // Fetch the file
01111                         $file = new $this->request_class($remote_file);
01112                         $file->sendRequest();
01113 
01114                         // Store it in S3
01115                         unset($object);
01116                         $object = $this->create_object($bucket, array(
01117                                 'filename' => $filename,
01118                                 'body' => $file->getResponseBody(),
01119                                 'contentType' => $file->getResponseHeader('content-type'),
01120                                 'acl' => $acl
01121                         ));
01122                 }
01123 
01124                 // Was the request successful?
01125                 if ($object->isOK())
01126                 {
01127                         $url = $object->header['x-tarzan-requesturl'];
01128 
01129                         // If we have a CNAME value, use that instead of Amazon's hostname. There are better ways of doing this, but it works for now.
01130                         if ($cname)
01131                         {
01132                                 $url = str_ireplace('http://', '', $url);
01133                                 $url = explode('/', $url);
01134                                 $url[0] = $cname;
01135                                 $url = 'http://' . implode('/', $url);
01136                         }
01137 
01138                         return $url;
01139                 }
01140                 else
01141                 {
01142                         return null;
01143                 }
01144         }
01145 }
